title: Flipped Learning-Based Advanced Information Literacy Simulation Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Information Search Skills and Understanding of Job-Related Technical Terminology
context.additional_context: Offers simulation environments reflecting real work scenarios to enhance job efficiency for current practitioners.

learning_goals: Learners can identify appropriate information sources for given task problems in VR simulation environments with 90% accuracy.
Learners can fully explain the five criteria for evaluating information through flipped learning pre-study materials.
Learners can improve and apply three or more information utilization strategies to real-world tasks through peer feedback sessions.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
